description:
Hungry ball physics is a physics puzzle game where you need to draw lines to lead the ball to the sweets. You have to overcome obstacles and hurdles in over 99 brain teasing Levels. 

Features :
- Simple physics puzzle with great gameplay
- over 99 Levels
- Puzzles with increasing difficulty
name: Hungry Ball Physics
intro: Draw a path and overcome obstacles, hurdles and brain teaser to lead the hungry ball to his loved sweets!
